Module it.polimi.ingsw.client.view

Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.layouts

package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.layouts
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    it.polimi.ingsw.server.model
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Corners
    The common goal layout with four tiles of the same type in the four corners of the bookshelf.
    Diagonal
    The common goal layout with five cards of the same type in a diagonal.
    FullLine
    The common goal layout with a row or a column with every cell filled.
    Group
    This class includes two different common goals: 1. the common goal with six groups of at least two equal items 2. the common goal with four groups of at least four equal items
    ItemsPerColor
    This is the common goal layout with eight items of the same color.
    Layout
    The disposition of the items in a common goal whose position has to be matched in the bookshelf.
    Square
    The common goal layout with a square of cells of the same type.
    Stair
    The common goal layout with columns of increasing or decreasing height.
    XShape
    The common goal layout with tiles of the same type forming an X shape.
